message.content:
{"content":"@@ /Volumes/Indexing/Calculator.ts
⋮ Class representing a calculator with event emitting capabilities
│    export class Calculator extends EventEmitter
⋮ Class constructor
│    constructor(maxHistory: number = 100)
⋮ Public arithmetic methods
│    add(a: number, b: number): number
│    subtract(a: number, b: number): number
│    multiply(a: number, b: number): number
│    divide(a: number, b: number): number
│    power(base: number, exponent: number): number
│    sqrt(value: number): number
⋮ Result accessors
│    getCurrentResult(): number
│    getHistory(): Array<{ operation: string, operands: number[], result: number, timestamp: Date }>
⋮ History manipulation
│    clearHistory(): void
│    getHistoryCount(): number
⋮ State manipulation
│    reset(): void
⋮ Statistics
│    getStats(): { totalCalculations: number, operationsCount: Record<string, number>, lastCalculation?: Date, currentResult: number }
⋮ Private validation
│    private validateOperands(...operands: number[]): void
⋮ Private history helper
│    private addToHistory(operation: string, operands: number[], result: number): void
","description":"The file defines a Calculator class extending EventEmitter, providing basic arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide, power, sqrt) with operand validation and history tracking. It emits events on initialization, calculation, errors, reset, and history clearing. The class offers access to current result, operation history, and statistics, and limits history size via a configurable max.","keywords":"Calculator class, event emitter, arithmetic history"}

arguments.content:
@@ /Volumes/Indexing/Calculator.ts
⋮ Class representing a calculator with event emitting capabilities
│    export class Calculator extends EventEmitter
⋮ Class constructor
│    constructor(maxHistory: number = 100)
⋮ Public arithmetic methods
│    add(a: number, b: number): number
│    subtract(a: number, b: number): number
│    multiply(a: number, b: number): number
│    divide(a: number, b: number): number
│    power(base: number, exponent: number): number
│    sqrt(value: number): number
⋮ Result accessors
│    getCurrentResult(): number
│    getHistory(): Array<{ operation: string, operands: number[], result: number, timestamp: Date }>
⋮ History manipulation
│    clearHistory(): void
│    getHistoryCount(): number
⋮ State manipulation
│    reset(): void
⋮ Statistics
│    getStats(): { totalCalculations: number, operationsCount: Record<string, number>, lastCalculation?: Date, currentResult: number }
⋮ Private validation
│    private validateOperands(...operands: number[]): void
⋮ Private history helper
│    private addToHistory(operation: string, operands: number[], result: number): void
arguments.description: The file defines a Calculator class extending EventEmitter, providing basic arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide, power, sqrt) with operand validation and history tracking. It emits events on initialization, calculation, errors, reset, and history clearing. The class offers access to current result, operation history, and statistics, and limits history size via a configurable max.
arguments.keywords: Calculator class, event emitter, arithmetic history
